title: Understanding and Utilizing Twitter Sentiment Analysis Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Environment enabling self-directed learning with digital devices, expandable to project-based learning linked to science curricula.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of a Twitter data collection and sentiment analysis system
Learners can demonstrate the basic operational procedures of a Python-based Twitter sentiment analysis tool
Learners can write a report interpreting sentiment levels (positive/negative) based on analysis results
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
